attributes.action: Strengthen our borders and implement as systems similar to that of Australia’s.
attributes.additional_details: During the Second World War thousands of our ancestors lost their lives fighting to keep Britain in contril of our land and people. We are disrespecting their service and allowing this to happen, people of different ethnicity’s and races flood into this country illegally everyday and if we continue to do nothing about it then we will lose our freedom and culture.
attributes.background: Thousands of Southern European and Muslim people illegally enter the UK every month. More and more taxpayers money is being invested into helping these criminals and causing strain on the healthcare and housing system. These people infringe on our human rights we must take action soon...

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
